item.title: Police say an Amazon driver ditched 80 packages in the woods before Christmas because they were ‘stressed’
item.description: “This is a human resources matter for Amazon,” Lakeville Police Chief Matthew Perkins said in a statement.

item.title: These 3 stocks are soaring as the U.S. rushes to patch its electrical grid
item.description: Much of the grid was built over 50 years ago, and AI data centers are just one reason energy demand has skyrocketed.

item.title: How Revelry evolved from selling sorority gear out of the trunk of a car to building a $39 million wedding-wear empire
item.description: Michelle DeLoach has done something few brands have achieved: matching her customers’ journeys so much that her entire business focus changed.

item.title: ‘A one-man economy’ who no one dared oppose: Working for Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs before the billionaire’s arrest on sex-trafficking charges
